[[1]](https://www.experienceberks.com/event/annual-benefit-auction-%26-gathering/7425/)[[4]](https://whereandwhen.com/events/annual-benefit-auction-3/) Other upcoming events include the Berks County Amish Historical Tour on March 28, 2026, and October 24, 2026, as well as the Schmucker/Smucker/Smoker Reunion on July 17-18, 2026 [[6]](http://www.nicholasstoltzfus.com/).

event_title: A Night in the French Quarter
evidence_date: Save the Date: A Night in the French Quarter. [[1]](https://charlemagne.4j.lane.edu/index.php?pageID=smartSiteFeed&psqFeed=true&articleID=71185957)[[2]](https://charlemagne.4j.lane.edu/index.php?pageID=smartSiteFeed&psqFeed=true&articleID=69991528) Please join us for an evening inspired by a 1920s New Orleans speakeasy, filled with great food, lively music, and fun fundraising activities. It's our most impactful fundraising event of the year! Saturday, May 2, 2026. [[1]](https://charlemagne.4j.lane.edu/index.php?pageID=smartSiteFeed&psqFeed=true&articleID=71185957)[[3]](https://charlemagne.4j.lane.edu/index.php?pageID=smartSiteFeed&psqFeed=true&articleID=69195756) 6:00 PM. [[3]](https://charlemagne.4j.lane.edu/index.php?pageID=smartSiteFeed&psqFeed=true&articleID=69195756)[[4]](https://hornpto.org/gala/) Ford Alumni Center — University of Oregon.
evidence_auction: Sponsorships and auction item donations play a major role in making this event successful, and we are still actively seeking both. [[1]](https://charlemagne.4j.lane.edu/index.php?pageID=smartSiteFeed&psqFeed=true&articleID=71185957)[[2]](https://charlemagne.4j.lane.edu/index.php?pageID=smartSiteFeed&psqFeed=true&articleID=69991528) Learn more about what kinds of auction items we're looking for and how to become a sponsor.
event_summary: A Night in the French Quarter is the school's most impactful annual fundraising event, styled as a 1920s New Orleans speakeasy featuring food, music, and auctions [[4]](https://charlemagne.4j.lane.edu/index.php?pageID=smartSiteFeed&psqFeed=true&articleID=69991528). The soirée supports essential programs including the French intern program, artists in residence, and classroom support specialists [[5]](https://charlemagne.4j.lane.edu/index.php?pageID=smartSiteFeed&psqFeed=true&articleID=71185957). [[1]](https://charlemagne.4j.lane.edu/index.php?pageID=smartSiteFeed&psqFeed=true&articleID=71185957)[[2]](https://charlemagne.4j.lane.edu/index.php?pageID=smartSiteFeed&psqFeed=true&articleID=69991528) Other upcoming school activities include a Jog-a-thon on May 20, 2026, and a McMenamin's dining fundraiser in March [[7]](https://www.charlemagnepto.com/events).

evidence_date: The nonprofit's annual Auction & Dinner will be held Friday, March 27, at Wesley Church, 1104 Kirkwood Drive, Quarryville. evidence_auction: We will have plenty of silent and live auction items - so there is always something for everyone! [[4]](https://allevents.in/quarryville/solid-rock-auction-and-dinner/200029618638208)
event_summary: The Solid Rock Auction & Dinner is an annual marquee fundraising event featuring a ham dinner and both silent and live auctions to support youth and families in the Solanco area [[4]](https://allevents.in/quarryville/solid-rock-auction-and-dinner/200029618638208) [[7]](https://townlively.com/bids-will-benefit-solid-rock/). The organization also mentions an annual 5k and a Banquet as part of its three primary community fundraising events [[15]](https://www.solidrockquarryville.com/businesspartners).

[[3]](https://www.cpfapa.org/donate) While the 2026 APA California Conference is scheduled for Los Angeles, specific dates for the 2026 conference and the associated CPF luncheon have not yet been published as of February 24, 2026 [[4]](https://www.apacalifornia.org/2026-conference/). Today's date is 02/24/2026. event_summary: Salute to Education is Alameda Education Foundation's premier annual event celebrating public education and innovative programs within the Alameda Unified School District [[7]](https://alamedaeducationfoundation.org/programs/salute-to-ed/salute-to-ed-w-tkt/). The event typically features school presentations, music, and community recognition, with proceeds often supporting Teacher Mini Grants [[12]](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=oUbTJPMJL3Y) [[15]](https://alamedaeducationfoundation.org/programs/salute-to-ed/salute-to-ed-2022/). evidence_auction: The TGWA Scholarship Auction is held annually during the convention to raise funds for the TGWA Scholarship Program. It features both a silent auction and a live auction [[1]](https://tgwa.org/convention).
event_summary: The 2027 TGWA Annual Convention & Trade Show is the organization's premier annual event, featuring professional development, networking, and a major fundraising component for the TGWA Scholarship Program [[1]](https://tgwa.org/convention). The fundraising includes a Scholarship Golf Tournament and a Scholarship Auction consisting of both live and silent segments [[1]](https://tgwa.org/convention). These efforts support students pursuing education related to the groundwater industry [[1]](https://tgwa.org/convention).

[[1]](https://oaklawnhospital.org/event/2026-oaklawn-benefit-auction/) [[3]](https://oaklawnhospital.org/event/2026-oaklawn-benefit-auction/)

event_summary: The 36th Annual Oaklawn Benefit Auction is a hybrid event themed 'Friday the 13th' that supports Oaklawn Oncology and Hematology services, specifically for purchasing essential medical equipment like patient beds and vital sign machines [[2]](https://oaklawnhospital.org/benefit-auction/). [[2]](https://oaklawnhospital.org/benefit-auction/) The event includes a two-week virtual silent auction starting March 2nd and culminates in an in-person gala on March 13, 2026, featuring live music, raffles, and a 'Penny Pull' [[3]](https://oaklawnhospital.org/event/2026-oaklawn-benefit-auction/). Other upcoming events include the Color Classic 5K and Fun Run scheduled for June 6, 2026 [[6]](https://oaklawnhospital.org/event/2026-color-classic/).

The event features both silent and live auctions, live music, and catering, and is considered the organization's largest fundraising event of the year [[3]](https://sweetser.ejoinme.org/MyEvents/2025SweetserAuctionGala/tabid/1539094/Default.aspx) [[6]](https://www.sweetser.org/live-auction-tickets-now-available/). evidence_date: The website navigation explicitly lists 'Dinner Auction Gala 2026' as a primary fundraising event under 'The ONE Oaks Fund' section [[3]](https://www.oakschristian.org/giving-and-getting-involved/the-one-oaks-fund). [[1]](https://www.oakschristian.org/giving-and-getting-involved/the-one-oaks-fund) While the specific calendar date for 2026 is not yet displayed on the public calendar, the school's annual gala historically occurs in early April (e.g., April 1 and April 5 in previous years) [[10]](https://citylifestyle.com/articles/oaks-christian-gala-a-smashing-success-2) [[13]](https://wmlifestyle.com/scene-around-oaks-christian-school-25th-anniversary-dinner-auction-gala-presents-the-bush-family/).
evidence_auction: The event is titled 'Dinner Auction Gala 2026' and the website mentions 'sponsorships, the online, silent, and live auctions' as components of this annual event [[3]](https://www.oakschristian.org/giving-and-getting-involved/the-one-oaks-fund) [[12]](https://www.oakschristian.org/our-stories/news-and-events-details/~board/featured-news/post/historic-gala-smashes-fundraising-records).
organization_address: 31749 La Tienda Dr. Westlake Village, CA 91362
event_summary: The Dinner Auction Gala is Oaks Christian School's premier annual fundraising event, supporting student programs, financial aid, and the school's mission [[3]](https://www.oakschristian.org/giving-and-getting-involved/the-one-oaks-fund). The event typically features high-profile guests, live and silent auctions, and musical performances by students from the Institute of Arts and Innovation [[12]](https://www.oakschristian.org/our-stories/news-and-events-details/~board/featured-news/post/historic-gala-smashes-fundraising-records). [[2]](https://www.oakschristian.org/our-stories/news-and-events-details/~board/featured-news/post/historic-gala-smashes-fundraising-records) Other upcoming activities include the 'Black Heritage Food Festival' on February 11, 2026, and 'Arts Under the Oaks' [[7]](https://www.oakschristian.org/life-together/calendar).

evidence_date: Firestarter | Tuesday, June 2, 6-9 pm. [[1]](https://www.glassart.org/corning-2026/special-events/) Grist Iron Brewing Company, Burdett, NY. [[1]](https://www.glassart.org/corning-2026/special-events/)[[2]](https://stainedglass.org/conferences/celebrating-community-expanding-futures) Join us before the official conference festivities for a fun evening at Grist Iron Brewing Company
evidence_auction: Reunite with glassy friends from around the world and put your opening bids in for our Glass Class Auction!
event_summary: Firestarter is a pre-conference fundraising event for the Glass Art Society (GAS) held at Grist Iron Brewing Company in Burdett, NY [[13]](https://www.glassart.org/corning-2026/special-events/). [[1]](https://www.glassart.org/corning-2026/special-events/) The event features a 'Glass Class Auction' where attendees can place opening bids, supporting the organization's mission to connect and empower the global glass community [[8]](https://www.glassart.org/conference/). Other upcoming events include the Corning 2026 Conference (June 3-6, 2026) which features the 'Goblet Grab' fundraiser and the Glass Fashion Show [[1]](https://www.glassart.org/corning-2026/), as well as the International Festival of Glass in the UK (August 27-31, 2026) [[10]](https://glassart.submittable.com/).
